mapper.insert: insert into rereply ( reply_key, rereply_writer, rereply_contents ) value ( #{reply_key}, #{rereply_writer}, #{rereply_contents})
mapper.update: update rereply set rereply_contents=#{rereply_contents}, rereply_udate=now() where rereply_key=#{rereply_key}
update rereply set rereply_lock=#{rereply_lock} where rereply_key=#{rereply_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from rereply where reply_key=#{reply_key} ;
mapper.insert: insert into rereplyLike ( rereply_key, rereply_writer, rereply_reaction) value (#{rereply_key}, #{rereply_writer}, #{rereply_reaction})
mapper.update: update rereplyLike set rereply_reaction=#{rereply_reaction} where rereply_key=#{rereply_key} and rereply_writer=#{rereply_writer};
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from rereplyLike where rereply_key=#{rereply_key} and rereply_reaction="like";
select count(*) as total from rereplyLike where rereply_key=#{rereply_key} and rereply_reaction="dislike";
